title: End of an era for tennis as Serena Williams and Roger Federer announce retirement
content:
End of an era for tennis as Serena Williams and Roger Federer announce retirement NPR's Ayesha Rascoe talks with ESPN's Chris Fowler about what the retirements of two tennis stars, Serena Williams and Roger Federer, mean for the sport.
